attachments.text: Joined the card *<https://trello.com/c/xNcmKrJL|[medium] Add the affiliate links to the default cardview in wordpress. Users want to be able to preview prices and we want to help them buy those cards.>*.

attachments.fallback:
David Keatts commented on [medium] Add the affiliate links to the default cardview in wordpress. Users want to be able to preview prices and we want to help them buy those cards.: "two new wordpress shortcodes (read: bbcode tags):
- [edhrec_link]
- [edhrec_cards]

[edhrec_link] creates a url to the edhrec card page for the given card name.  when you mouse over the url, the card image pops up, similar to the behavior on the react homepage.

example usage: `[edhrec_link]Ulrich of the Krallenhorde[/edhrec_link]`

[edhrec_cards] creates a row of card images that one might use to draw attention to 1-3 cards being discussed in an article.  cards are automatically centered.

example usage: ```
[edhrec_cards]
Blood Moon
Earthquake
Red Elemental Blast
[/edhrec_cards]
```

these changes are being provided by the new edhrec wordpress plugin, and data is dynamically loaded from the api.  changes are live now, examples can be seen here: <https://articles.edhrec.com/test/>"
attachments.text:
two new wordpress shortcodes (read: bbcode tags):
- [edhrec_link]
- [edhrec_cards]

[edhrec_link] creates a url to the edhrec card page for the given card name.  when you mouse over the url, the card image pops up, similar to the behavior on the react homepage.

example usage: `[edhrec_link]Ulrich of the Krallenhorde[/edhrec_link]`

[edhrec_cards] creates a row of card images that one might use to draw attention to 1-3 cards being discussed in an article.  cards are automatically centered.

example usage: ```
[edhrec_cards]
Blood Moon
Earthquake
Red Elemental Blast
[/edhrec_cards]
```

these changes are being provided by the new edhrec wordpress plugin, and data is dynamically loaded from the api.  changes are live now, examples can be seen here: <https://articles.edhrec.com/test/>

attachments.fallback: David Keatts commented on [medium] Add the affiliate links to the default cardview in wordpress. Users want to be able to preview prices and we want to help them buy those cards.: "the one remaining feature being provided by the WP MTG plugin and not by the edhrec plugin is decklists.  one alternative to rewriting the decklist plugin would be to add a new tag that auto-generates a "buy this decklist on Card Kingdom / TCGPlayer / Cardhoarder" url.  Would people buy full decks from an article?"
attachments.text: the one remaining feature being provided by the WP MTG plugin and not by the edhrec plugin is decklists.  one alternative to rewriting the decklist plugin would be to add a new tag that auto-generates a "buy this decklist on Card Kingdom / TCGPlayer / Cardhoarder" url.  Would people buy full decks from an article?
